definition: property or cash held in reserve/stock
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive

sentences.english: Dynamic reliability analysis and compare of rail based on random process over-crossing theory;
sentences.chinese: 基於隨機過程理論對物流活動中的庫存管理進行優化。

sentences.english: Zero stock is the best way for inventory control.
sentences.chinese: 零庫存是庫存管理最好的發展方向。

sentences.chinese: 零庫存是庫存管理最好的發展方向。

sentences.english: To enhance the correctness of curtain, card, material and warrant.
sentences.chinese: 提高庫存料件的帳，卡，物和單證輸入的準確率。

sentences.english: A: I just got an answer about the stock we have on hand.
sentences.chinese: 我剛剛接獲通知我們現有庫存量。

sentences.english: Survey found that more yarn than polyester factory inventory pressure.
sentences.chinese: 調查發現，紗廠比滌綸工廠庫存壓力更大。

sentences.english: A rapid rundown in inventories and temporary distortions in credit markets (see article) have not helped.
sentences.chinese: 庫存量的快速削減和信貸市場上的臨時畸變於事無補。

sentences.english: It represents the average rate that a balance of inventory is turned in one year.
sentences.chinese: 指庫存額在一年中的平均週轉率。

sentences.english: Coordinate & lead regular cycle count, take active part in stock-take; be responsible for the inventory accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 通過對庫存進行週期性盤點，以保證庫存準確性。

sentences.english: Coordinate & lead regular cycle count, take active part in stock-take; be responsible for the inventory accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 通過對庫存進行週期性盤點，以保證庫存準確性。

sentences.english: Deliver in-stock items within a few days.
sentences.chinese: 提供庫存項目在幾天之內。

sentences.english: Some 44 million antipersonnel mines have been destroyed from stockpiles.
sentences.chinese: 庫存的殺傷人員地雷已有4400萬個被銷燬了。

sentences.english: Use a first-in, first-out system. Keep good inventory records.
sentences.chinese: 採用先進先出庫存管理系統做好庫存記錄。

sentences.english: Use a first-in, first-out system. Keep good inventory records.
sentences.chinese: 採用先進先出庫存管理系統做好庫存記錄。

sentences.english: Steel prices still benefit from prophase effects of restricting output brings to inventory effect.
sentences.chinese: 鋼材價格上漲仍然受益於前期限產帶來的去庫存效果。

sentences.english: After retail sales last week, some inventory pressure slightly reduced.
sentences.chinese: 上週銷貨後，部分庫存壓力稍減。

definition: to procure (for an enterprise etc)/to purchase
to slow/to slow down (the pace of)
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
